message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_SERVICEOFFERING
message.locale: An '%1c' approval check already exists for this service offering.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_SERVICEOFFERING_NOT_ACTIVE_APPROVAL_CHECK_CANNOT_BE_SPECIFIED
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not '%2c', approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_ENDED_IN_PAST
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, has ended in the past, the approval check cannot be specified for it.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_SERVICE_OFFERING_AND_ORGANIZATION_UNIT
message.locale: An 'Active' approval check already exists for the service, %1s, for the organization unit, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.
An 'Active' approval check already exists for the service, %1s, for the organisation unit, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_SERVICE_OFFERING_AND_USER
message.locale: An 'Active' approval check already exists for the service, %1s, for the user, %2s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_ALL_SERVICE_OFFERINGS_AND_ORGANIZATION_UNIT
message.locale: An 'Active' approval check already exists for all services, for the organization unit, %1s, approval check cannot be specified.
An 'Active' approval check already exists for all services, for the organisation unit, %1s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_ACTIVE_APPROVALCHECK_EXISTS_FOR_ALL_SERVICE_OFFERINGS_AND_USER
message.locale: An 'Active' approval check already exists for all services, for the user, %1s, approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_FV_EITHER_APPLIES_TO_ALL_INDICATOR_OR_SERVICE_OFFERING_TO_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: One of either 'Applies to All Services' or an individual service offering must be selected.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_FV_APPLIES_TO_ALL_INDICATOR_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED_IF_SERVICE_OFFERING_IS_SELECTED
message.locale: 'Applies to All Services' cannot be selected if an individual service offering is specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_APPROVAL_CHECK_CAN_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ACTIVE_ORGANIZATION_UNIT
message.locale: The organization unit, %1s, is not 'Active', approval check cannot be specified.
The organisation unit, %1s, is not 'Active', approval check cannot be specified.

message.name: ERR_SERVICEOFFERINGAPPROVALCHECK_XRV_APPROVAL_CHECK_CAN_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ACTIVE_USER
message.locale: The user, %1s, is not 'Active', approval check cannot be specified.
